column4: Hi guys, My friend wants to connect to IRC to get help on a problem he is having. He is trying to connect from his university where they use a proxy. I assume the proxy is only forwarding port 80 (correct me as I don't know much about proxies) so is there a way to set up gaim or xchat to connect to freenode via his proxy. (He currently has the proxy settings configured in gnome as synaptic works fine)
there are web sites that will be your proxy to alow that
could you give me an example please. I googled before with little luck
no idea i just remember reading it
